mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer(answer_no, member_no, qna_no, answer_content, answer_rdate, answer_passwd, file1, thumb1, size1) VALUES(answer_seq.nextval, 1, #{qna_no}, #{answer_content}, sysdate, '1234', #{file1}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT answer_no, member_no, qna_no, answer_content, answer_rdate, answer_passwd, file1, thumb1, size1 FROM answer ORDER BY answer_no ASC
SELECT answer_no, member_no, qna_no, answer_content, answer_rdate, answer_passwd, file1, thumb1, size1 FROM answer WHERE qna_no = #{qna_no} ORDER BY answer_no DESC
